result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas G Weedman

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Paid $531.75 bill to Attorney Limbeck.  Reimbursement entered on case 15CF256.

and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees filed by Atty Limbeck 
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the attached attorney's statement of fees and epenses are approved in the amount of $531.75. Further, that the County of Sheboygan shall pay the attorney's fee and expenses in the amount of $531.75 to Atty George Limbeck 
IT IS ALSO HEREBY ORDERED that the Defendant, Thomas G. Weedman, reimburse Sheboygan County in the amount of $531.75. Further, that the defendant shall complete such reimbursement at the rate previously ordered by the Court. Should the defendant fail to reimburse Sheboygan County for the amount owed, Sheboygan County may proceed with a civil judgment against the defendant in order to collect on the funds.

Def appeared with Attorney Limbeck.  
Plea questionnaire filed.
To be dismissed and read-in.
To the Court from Attorney Limbeck.

Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Limbeck
NG by th eCourt

Notice of Appointment filed by Atty Limbeck
From the Court to Atty Limbeck

Petition for appointment of counsel, affidavit of indigency and order.  Atty. Limbeck is appointed as counsel.
Defendant is to repay Sheboygan County at the rate of $25 per month until total sum is paid.
The first payment shall be made on 7-1-15.  $70 per hour, not to exceed a total of $750 without prior approval of Court.

Deft appeared in custody, does not qualify for public defender
Court will appt Atty Limbeck
